name: Bloobs!
description:
Bloobs!

Bloobs! is a game about helping little bloobies find love. Bloobs! is a game created by CollectQT for RuinGameJam. It was written in python with pygame and is still very much in alpha. So alpha that there isn't yet much to do o_o!

Your valiant game dev team is:

  • Kord - Graphics
  • Cassie - Pythonista
  • Lynn - Pythonista
  • Joanna - Music

If you want to help CollectQT grow, or want some of MsBlackhart's great musics, head over to CollectQT's BandCamp to get the OST.
